subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rochelle Sterling continued to entertain offers from potential buyers of the Los Angeles Clippers on Tuesday as her husband, Donald, sent the N.B.A. a 32-page response signaling his intent to fight.
snippet: Rochelle Sterling continued to entertain offers from potential buyers of the Los Angeles Clippers on Tuesday as her husband, Donald, sent the N.B.A. a 32-page response signaling his intent to fight.
